definitions.text: a pass to a receiver downfield from the passer
an electrical device that sends or receives radio or television signals
existing or living or growing or operating in the air
examples: small aerial creatures such as butterflies

definitions.text: characterized by lightness and insubstantiality; as impalpable or intangible as air; - Thomas Carlyle
examples: figures light and aeriform come unlooked for and melt away
